ISSUE.TITLE: Build Failure for ProductTest class
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Hi Team, I have facing this issue since long. This issue is an assertion failed in my machine. I have debugged more and found the error in ProductTest.java class in sm-core. In the method `private void testAttributes(Product product) throws Exception {} ` it shows the error at below line. ` Assert.assertEquals(new Long(attributes.size()).longValue(), 3l);` Step to reproduce in windows machine - [ ] git clone shopizer - [ ] cd shopizer - [ ] mvn clean install which will throws below error > [ERROR] Tests run: 1, Failures: 1, Errors: 0, Skipped: 0, Time elapsed: 0.233 s <<< FAILURE! - in com.salesmanager.test.catalog.ProductTest [ERROR] testCreateProduct Time elapsed: 0.231 s <<< FAILURE! java.lang.AssertionError: expected:<6> but was:<3> at com.salesmanager.test.catalog.ProductTest.testAttributes(ProductTest.java:516) at com.salesmanager.test.catalog.ProductTest.testCreateProduct(ProductTest.java:338)

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: order item list and featured items
